mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_ITEM_PROP ( ORDER_CODE, ORDER_ITEM_CODE, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_KEY, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_VALUE, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_OPTION, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_INDEX, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_AUTHOR, UPDATE_DATETIME ) VALUES ( #{orderCode}, #{orderItemCode}, #{orderItemPropKey}, #{orderItemPropValue}, #{orderItemPropOption}, #{orderItemPropIndex}, #{createAuthor}, current_timestamp(), #{updateAuthor}, current_timestamp() )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ORDER_ITEM_PROP WHERE ORDER_CODE = #{orderCode} AND ORDER_ITEM_CODE = #{orderItemCode} AND ORDER_ITEM_PROP_KEY = #{orderItemPropKey}
mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_CODE AS "orderCode", ORDER_ITEM_CODE AS "orderItemCode", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_KEY AS "orderItemPropKey", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_VALUE AS "orderItemPropValue", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_OPTION AS "orderItemPropOption", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_INDEX AS "orderItemPropIndex", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM ORDER_ITEM_PROP WHERE ORDER_CODE = #{orderCode} AND ORDER_ITEM_CODE = #{orderItemCode} AND ORDER_ITEM_PROP_KEY = #{orderItemPropKey}

SELECT ORDER_CODE AS "orderCode", ORDER_ITEM_CODE AS "orderItemCode", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_KEY AS "orderItemPropKey", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_VALUE AS "orderItemPropValue", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_OPTION AS "orderItemPropOption", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_INDEX AS "orderItemPropIndex", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM ORDER_ITEM_PROP WHERE ORDER_CODE = #{orderCode} AND ORDER_ITEM_CODE = #{orderItemCode} AND ORDER_ITEM_PROP_KEY = #{orderItemPropKey} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ORDER_CODE AS "orderCode", ORDER_ITEM_CODE AS "orderItemCode", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_KEY AS "orderItemPropKey", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_VALUE AS "orderItemPropValue", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_OPTION AS "orderItemPropOption", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_INDEX AS "orderItemPropIndex", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM ORDER_ITEM_PROP WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORDER_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderCode}, '%') AND ORDER_ITEM_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderItemCode}, '%') AND ORDER_ITEM_PROP_KEY LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderItemPropKey}, '%') AND ORDER_ITEM_PROP_VALUE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderItemPropValue}, '%') AND ORDER_ITEM_PROP_OPTION LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderItemPropOption}, '%') AND ORDER_ITEM_PROP_INDEX LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderItemPropIndex}, '%') AND CREATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{createAuthor}, '%') AND UPDATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{updateAuthor}, '%') AND CREATE_DATETIME > #{createDatetime} AND UPDATE_DATETIME > #{updateDatetime} ORDER BY ${theOrderByCondition} GROUP BY ${theGroupByCondition} LIMIT ${theFetchStart} , ${theFetchSize}

SELECT ORDER_CODE AS "orderCode", ORDER_ITEM_CODE AS "orderItemCode", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_KEY AS "orderItemPropKey", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_VALUE AS "orderItemPropValue", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_OPTION AS "orderItemPropOption", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_INDEX AS "orderItemPropIndex", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM ORDER_ITEM_PROP WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( ${orderCode} ) AND ( ${orderItemCode} ) AND ( ${orderItemPropKey} ) AND ( ${orderItemPropValue} ) AND ( ${orderItemPropOption} ) AND ( ${orderItemPropIndex} ) AND ( ${theSQLCondition} ) ORDER BY ${theOrderByCondition} GROUP BY ${theGroupByCondition} LIMIT ${theFetchStart} , ${theFetchSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_ITEM_PROP_HT ( ORDER_CODE, ORDER_ITEM_CODE, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_KEY, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_VALUE, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_OPTION, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_INDEX, OPERATION_HISTORY_DATETIME, OPERATION_HISTORY_CATEGORY ) VALUES ( #{orderCode}, #{orderItemCode}, #{orderItemPropKey}, #{orderItemPropValue}, #{orderItemPropOption}, #{orderItemPropIndex}, current_timestamp(), 'C' )

INSERT INTO ORDER_ITEM_PROP_HT ( ORDER_CODE, ORDER_ITEM_CODE, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_KEY, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_VALUE, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_OPTION, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_INDEX, OPERATION_HISTORY_DATETIME, OPERATION_HISTORY_CATEGORY ) VALUES ( #{orderCode}, #{orderItemCode}, #{orderItemPropKey}, #{orderItemPropValue}, #{orderItemPropOption}, #{orderItemPropIndex}, current_timestamp(), 'U' )

INSERT INTO ORDER_ITEM_PROP_HT ( ORDER_CODE, ORDER_ITEM_CODE, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_KEY, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_VALUE, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_OPTION, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_INDEX, OPERATION_HISTORY_DATETIME, OPERATION_HISTORY_CATEGORY ) VALUES ( #{orderCode}, #{orderItemCode}, #{orderItemPropKey}, #{orderItemPropValue}, #{orderItemPropOption}, #{orderItemPropIndex}, current_timestamp(), 'D' )
